Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

Keerthy Suresh dazzled on her wedding day in a striking red saree with a green blouse that featured trendy Juliette sleeves. This fashion choice has been widely embraced by celebrities.

  • Keerthy wore two traditional silk sarees during her wedding; one in crimson red and the other parrot green with unique styling.
  • The Juliette sleeves, inspired by classical designs, signify a rising trend in contemporary bridal fashion.
  • Other celebrities, including Alia Bhatt and Khushi Kapoor, have also showcased similar styles, signaling a shift towards romantic and whimsical clothing.
  • The trend is anticipated to dominate fashion scenes in upcoming seasons due to its appeal among style icons.
This season’s fashion landscape is witnessing a dramatic shift with the emergence of Juliette sleeves as the latest trend.

In conclusion, the popularity of Juliette sleeves reflects a significant change in wedding fashion, blending tradition with modern elegance.

Tabla maestro Ustad Zakir Hussain passes away at 73 in the US - The Times of India
summary:
Tabla Maestro Ustad Zakir Hussain Passes Away at 73 in the US

Publication Date: December 15, 2023 Source: Times of India

Renowned tabla maestro Zakir Hussain passed away at the age of 73 in the US due to health concerns related to his heart and blood pressure.

  • Zakir Hussain was admitted to the ICU for serious heart-related problems.
  • He started learning the tabla at a young age and contributed significantly to both Indian classical and global music.
  • Hussain received numerous prestigious awards, including the Padma Shri, Padma Bhushan, and Padma Vibhushan from the Government of India.
“He made remarkable contributions to both Indian classical and world music.”

The passing of Zakir Hussain marks a significant loss to the global music community, as he was not only an esteemed musician but also an ambassador of Indian music across the world.
newTitle: Tabla Maestro Ustad Zakir Hussain Passes Away at 73 in the US

title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 11 early report: Allu Arjun film nears Rs 900 crore mark in India, eyes Baahubali 2’s record - The Indian Express
summary:

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to break box office records as it approaches the Rs 900 crore milestone in India, with significant earnings expected over the weekend.

  • The film experienced a 73% surge in collections on Saturday.
  • By Sunday evening, it had already collected Rs 57.22 crore for that day alone.
  • The Hindi version is projected to earn Rs 60-65 crore on Sunday.
  • Pushpa 2 has surpassed the domestic lifetime collection of RRR with Rs 866.5 crore domestically and Rs 1,196 crore worldwide.
  • The film aims to break Baahubali 2's domestic record of Rs 1,030.42 crore.
“Despite the controversy, the actor has received overwhelming support from his colleagues in the film industry.”

The film's success is being tempered by recent controversies involving Allu Arjun, yet public support remains strong.

Date: December 15, 2024 • Source: Koreaboo

NewJeans’ new Instagram account has become a direct communication line with fans since its launch post their departure from ADOR. The account faced controversy over its initial bio which included colors identical to those of Red Velvet, stirring discussions among fans of both groups.

  • The account is used by NewJeans to share updates and messages with fans.
  • The original bio featured colored hearts similar to those associated with Red Velvet.
  • Red Velvet fans criticized the choice, suggesting the colors should have been different given the previous association.
  • NewJeans quickly updated their bio to reflect the members' representative animals instead of the colored hearts.
  • The swift change suggests the group's awareness of and response to the controversy.
“They saw us fighting back over colours…” — Fan reaction on social media

This situation highlights the complex dynamics between fan communities in K-Pop and reflects how quickly groups can adapt to fan feedback.

title: Fourth-Generation Idol Sentenced To 8 Years In Prison After Killing Man In Drunk Driving Accident - Koreaboo
summary:
Fourth-Generation Idol Sentenced To 8 Years In Prison After Killing Man In Drunk Driving Accident

Date: 5 hours ago
Source: Koreaboo

The infamous DJ Yesong, whose real name is Ahn Ye Song, has been sentenced to eight years in prison following a tragic incident where she caused the death of a motorcyclist while driving under the influence.

  • The fatal accident occurred in February in Seoul’s Gangnam district.
  • DJ Yesong was heavily intoxicated with a blood alcohol level of 0.221%.
  • The victim was a delivery worker in his 50s who succumbed to injuries shortly after the crash.
  • DJ Yesong was fleeing from a previous traffic incident at the time of the crash.
  • The appellate court reduced her initial 10-year sentence to 8 years after considering her confession and an agreement with the victim’s family.
“Despite further appeals by DJ Yesong, claiming the reduced sentence was excessive, the Supreme Court dismissed her case, affirming the eight-year prison term.”

The case highlights issues of reckless driving and alcohol consumption, emphasizing the responsibilities of individuals behind the wheel.
newTitle: Fourth-Generation Idol Sentenced To 8 Years In Prison After Killing Man In Drunk Driving Accident

Pushpa 2: Special treat for Hyderabad movie lovers - 123telugu
summary:
Pushpa 2: Special treat for Hyderabad movie lovers

Published on: Dec 15, 2024 4:46 pm IST

The dynamic duo of Allu Arjun and Sukumar has delivered yet another sensational blockbuster with Pushpa 2: The Rule. The film is smashing records worldwide, a testament to Allu Arjun’s incredible star power and his stellar performance.

Initially, the makers planned to release the film in 3D alongside 2D and other rich formats. However, the 3D release was unexpectedly postponed just hours before the premiere. Now, in an exciting update, the 3D version is finally available in select theaters in Hyderabad starting today.

Currently, only a few theaters in Hyderabad are screening the 3D version, but the makers have assured fans that it will soon expand to more cities and theaters. For now, Hyderabad audiences have the exclusive opportunity to experience Pushpa 2 in 3D.

Produced by Mythri Movie Makers, the film features a stellar ensemble cast, including Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil, Sunil, Anasuya Bharadwaj, Rao Ramesh, and Jagapathi Babu in pivotal roles. The music is composed by Devi Sri Prasad, with additional score by Sam CS, adding to the film’s electrifying appeal.
newTitle: Pushpa 2: Special treat for Hyderabad movie lovers

title: World's highest-paid actor earned $156 million for one project, several times more than Tom Cruise, Shah Rukh, Brad Pitt - Hindustan Times
summary:
Keanu Reeves Sets Record with $156 Million Paycheck for 'The Matrix' Sequel

Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Keanu Reeves achieved a remarkable milestone by earning $156 million for his role in the 'Matrix' sequels, setting a record that remains unbroken for over 20 years.

  • Reeves earned a $30 million upfront salary plus profit shares for 'The Matrix Reloaded' and 'The Matrix Revolutions'.
  • His earnings from the sequels surpassed $156 million, significantly higher than his peers like Tom Cruise and Shah Rukh Khan.
  • This pay scale reflects the huge box office success of the films, which grossed $1.2 billion combined.
  • Prior to this, Alec Guinness held the record with $94 million for 'Star Wars', considering multiple releases.
  • Reeves has not been able to command such high fees since, with later films netting him between $15-30 million each.
“The $156 million mark is so high that no actor has come close in the 21 years since.”

Keanu's record signifies a peak in Hollywood salaries that has not been replicated, showcasing both his star power and the unprecedented success of the 'Matrix' franchise.
newTitle: Keanu Reeves Sets Record with $156 Million Paycheck for 'The Matrix' Sequel

title: Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024 - The Times of India
summary:
Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Delhi Times

Welcome to this week's horoscope, where the celestial alignments offer insight into the lives of the zodiac signs. From career and love to finances and health, these forecasts provide a glimpse into what the week holds for you.

  • Aries: Embrace your energy, expect challenging situations at work but seize new opportunities.
  • Taurus: Focus on stability and patience; relationships will deepen.
  • Gemini: Engage your curiosity and creativity; prioritize your tasks to avoid overwhelm.
  • Cancer: Emotional growth is key—trust your intuition and nurture relationships.
  • Leo: Balance ambition with relationships; face work challenges with calm communication.
  • Virgo: Be practical yet compassionate; celebrate small wins amidst challenges.
  • Libra: Seek balance; good communication will clear recent misunderstandings.
  • Scorpio: Blend caution with boldness; talk through worries with friends.
  • Sagittarius: Focus on self-discipline while pursuing creative opportunities.
  • Capricorn: Maintain productivity without overburdening yourself; self-care is crucial.
  • Aquarius: Nurture relationships while sharing innovative ideas at work.
  • Pisces: Embrace your emotions; seek a balance between helping others and self-care.
“Trust your instincts when making decisions, as they will guide you toward the best outcomes.”

Overall, this week the horoscopes emphasize a mix of personal growth, relationship dynamics, and the importance of self-care amidst challenges. Keep an open mind and embrace the insights offered by the stars.
newTitle: Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024

Date: December 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Earlier this week, Saif Ali Khan and others met Prime Minister Narendra Modi to invite him for Raj Kapoor’s 100th birth anniversary celebration.

  • The meeting included actors from the Kapoor family and was held to invite PM Modi to the Raj Kapoor Film Festival.
  • Saif described PM Modi as warm and charming despite a long day in Parliament.
  • During the meeting, Modi inquired about Saif’s children and signed a paper for them.
  • The film festival will feature ten films of Raj Kapoor across 40 cities in India from December 13-15.
“He asked about my parents individually and said he thought we would bring Taimur and Jeh to meet him.” - Saif Ali Khan

This meeting highlights the connection between Bollywood and politics, showing the importance of Raj Kapoor's legacy.

title: Anushka Shetty’s Ghaati locks its release date - 123telugu
summary:
Anushka Shetty’s Ghaati locks its release date

Published on Dec 15, 2024 by Latest Telugu cinema news

Ghaati is set to be the next big release for ‘The Queen’ Anushka Shetty. The recently unveiled glimpse features her in a completely new, massy avatar, showcasing a fresh side of her acting. Directed by Krish Jagarlamudi, this pan-Indian film is already generating buzz.

  • The movie will release on April 18, 2025, in multiple languages including Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, Kannada, and Malayalam.
  • Anushka portrays a compelling role as a former victim turned criminal, portraying a legendary weed trader in a gripping tale of revenge, redemption, and retribution.
  • The film features Vikram Prabhu in a key role and has a screenplay by Krish, Sai Madhav Burra, and Chintakindi Srinivasa Rao.
  • Produced by UV Creations and First Frame Entertainments, Ghaati is shaping up to be an exciting project.
Stay tuned for more updates.

In summary, Ghaati is creating significant excitement among audiences ahead of its release, marking another milestone in Anushka Shetty's career.
